title: About
text: Hi, my name is Pranav. The purpose of this blog is to document my projects and thoughts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is my first blog post. Welcome!
I decided to start a blog inspired by Jeremy Howardâ€™s Lecture 0 from the FastAI Course. Jeremy and FastAI used to maintain a blogging and publication tool called FastPages but transitioned to a new publication system called Quarto.
This blog is written in Quarto. Why Quarto? In the past I had attempted to used Medium and Substack but never fully spent the time to learn the tools to write a blog post. I decided to learn and publish with Quarto because of its capabilities to produce high quality scientific and technical documents with the ability to embed code and visualizations for review. Another reason why I like Quarto is how easy it is to write markdown and publish a website.
Going forward I hope to use Quarto to write about my programming projects, thoughts, and improve my writing.
